actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-622.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 2626, to establish voluntary limits on the annual increases in total hospital expenses, and to provide for mandatory limits on the annual increases in hospital inpatient revenues to the extent that the voluntary limits are not effective.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2626 (Hospital expenses).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 2626, to establish voluntary limits on the annual increases in total hospital expenses, and to provide for mandatory limits on the annual increases in hospital inpatient revenues to the extent that the voluntary limits are not effective.
